root.name: Battlestar Galactica
root.description: Developed by Auran Games Pty Ltd and published by Sierra Online, Battlestar Galactica is a top down shooter on the Xbox Live Arcade. Released on October 24, 2007 , the game set out to capitalise on the critical aclaime of the television show of the same name. The game was met with bad to lukewarm reviews; as Mark Wilson, of Kotaku said, "Battlestar Galactica XBLA failed to meet even my most meager of expectations"
